t:
Being a new mother, I just hope that my baby daughter will stop crying, so that I can sleep.


I can no longer bear to spend every night rocking the empty cradle, crying and asking
her to
forgive me.
c:
She'll take revenge.



Collab and share why you are awake so late despite not wanting to. #awakedont  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#daughter #dead #revenge #girlchild #crying #infanticide
